pages.text: A Seismic Sensor is an early game item used to track down $(l:base_concepts/oil)Oil/$. Unlike most tools, the sensor does not require $(l:base_concepts/pressure)pressure/$ to operate. When $(thing)right-clicked/$, it will show whether or not Oil was found somewhere directly below the block the sensor was clicked on.

A Seismic Sensor can have two results:$(p)$(#008)  No Oil found./$$(p)No Oil is found right under this block. Keep looking.$(p)$(#008)  Found Oil <distance>m below. It contains about <amount> buckets of Oil./$$(p)Oil is found! The clicked block would be a suitable place to put a $(l:machines/gas_lift)Gas Lift/$ to pump the Oil out.
